permalink: /docs/llms.txt
---
# BuiltFast Documentation Index
# https://builtfast.dev
#
# This file provides an index of all documentation and API endpoints
# for use by AI assistants and language models.
#
# Base URL: https://builtfast.dev

## Documentation Pages

{% assign docs = site.docs | sort: "order" %}
{% assign categories = docs | map: "category" | uniq %}
{% for category in categories %}
{% if category and category != "" %}

### {{ category }}
{% assign category_docs = docs | where: "category", category %}
{% for doc in category_docs %}
- {{ doc.title }}: https://builtfast.dev{{ doc.url }}
{% endfor %}
{% endif %}
{% endfor %}

## API Reference

Base URL: https://api.builtfast.com
API Documentation: https://builtfast.dev/api/
OpenAPI Spec: https://builtfast.dev/api/openapi.yaml

{% for group in site.data.api_groups %}

### {{ group.name }}
{% if group.description != '' %}
{{ group.description | strip_html | strip_newlines | truncate: 200 }}
{% endif %}

{% for subgroup in group.subgroups %}
{% if subgroup.name != '' %}
#### {{ subgroup.name }}
{% endif %}
{% for endpoint in subgroup.endpoints %}
- {{ endpoint.method }} {{ endpoint.uri_display }} - {{ endpoint.title }}
{% endfor %}
{% endfor %}
{% endfor %}

## SDK Documentation

- PHP SDK: https://builtfast.dev/docs/tools/php-sdk/
- Node.js SDK: https://builtfast.dev/docs/tools/node-sdk/
- CLI: https://builtfast.dev/docs/tools/cli/

## Additional Resources

- Blog: https://builtfast.dev/blog/
- Open Source Projects: https://builtfast.dev/oss/
- Changelog: https://builtfast.dev/changelog/
